entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Path parsing differs in handling of `#r` on .NET 6.0 #61233
  • Regex parser produces different messages in .NET 6 #61232
  • Incremental SG - Unit-testing the pipeline / caching-behaviour using GeneratorDriver #61230
  • Sort order different in .NET 6; impacts tests #61229
  • Building skeleton assemblies appears to be much more expensive now that we have generators. #61226
  • Stack frame parser fails to parse line numbers on .NET #61225
  • Completion in doc comments eats the space when typing "code" #61223
  • Existing classification tests need to be updated to run both directly on the roslyn API, or through the LSP wrapper around it. #61219
  • VB.NET .NET 6 Throws "cannot create boxed byref-like values" exception when using AsSpan instead of Substring in an interpolated string #61218
  • Add AnalyzerConfigSet.GetOptionsForDirectory #61217
  • Update Regex subsystem error messages to match changes in .net's error messages #61215
  • Update REgexParser to understand `RegexOption.NonBacktracking` once available in the version of the runtime we reference. #61214
  • Json classification appears to be broken with 'LSP classification' on. #61212
  • Yet Another Formatting Bug - Lambda within Object Initializer #61206
  • Improve NormalizeWhitespace for object initializers #61204
  • Better conversion target rules should be updated for nint/nuint #61199
    17.3

Closed

  • When I copy text which includes a stack trace, the Stack Trace Explorer window appears, covering other content #60382
    17.3
  • Increment operator not recognised as invoking get accessor #43191
    Backlog
  • [Expression Evaluator] C# FunctionResolver resolves async methods to async kickoff method, which does not have debug info. #52313
    Backlog
  • Invalid IL produced for an unused struct load from a `ref` local #60905
    17.3
  • Make local function 'static' removes `unsafe` modifier #61207
  • "Add null check" quickfix should support generating ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull() calls #61181
  • Use explicit type should be updated to replace with non-nullable type if possible #41243
    Backlog
  • Need API for enumerating AnalyzerConfigOptions #41840
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Test the EditorFeatures layer on net472 and net6.0-windows #61234
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Add JSON semantic token classifications #61231
    Area-IDE
  • Remove document options provider #61228
    Area-IDE
  • ignore top level statements from move static member refactoring #61227
    Area-IDE
  • Skip timing test #61222
    Area-Compilers, Disabled Test
  • More SyntaxContext sharing among CompletionProviders #61221
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState" #61216
    Area-IDE
  • Fix for Issue #55606: [EE] Format IAsyncEnumerable method names correctly. #61211
    Area-Compilers
  • feat: Ordering generator by GenerateAfter and GenerateBefore attributes #61210
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add FixAll in Project and Solution support for AddFileBanner refactoring #61208
    Area-Analyzers
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add the full VS Mac IVTs to match existing projects #61203
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add tests for implementing static events in derived interfaces. #61201
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Change IDE0052 title for properties when using increment operator #61166
    Area-Analyzers, Community, Next
  • Snippets: If snippet and use of LSP's SnippetExpander #60860
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unnecessary parameter. #61202
    Area-Compilers
  • Add tests for implementing static properties in derived interfaces. #61200
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Record read of ref local even if value is discarded #60910
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Share SyntaxContext among all internal CompletionProviders #61057
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE, auto-merge, Next
  • Add support for implementing static members in derived interfaces. #61134
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61198
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Improve editorconfig options caching on ProjectState #61131
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Add support for CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #61113
    Area-Compilers
  • Remaining fallback options #60888
    Area-IDE
  • Improve performance of StringText.Write & StringBuilderText.Write on .NET Core #61167
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll support for "Convert to raw string" refactoring #61105
    Area-IDE
  • Remove Razor and editor inference document option providers #61091
    Area-IDE
  • WIP: Provide dedicated classifications for embedded C# in test code. #61197
    Area-IDE
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix nested in generic type binding issues in enabled nullability context #61182
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • [EE] Implement IDkmClrFullNameProvider2 in Roslyn's ResultProvider Formatter. #60522
    Area-Interactive, Community
  • Unify nint and IntPtr #60913
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve SyntaxNormalizer performance #50778
    Area-Compilers
